title: How many bathrooms have Neanderthals in the tile?
dot:
digraph FossilDiscovery{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];RedditPost[label="Reddit Post by Kidipadeli75
Found mandible in travertine floor"];Dentist[label="Dentist recognizes
human jawbone in travertine"];Travertine[label="Travertine
- Limestone from natural springs
- Often contains fossils"];FossilInclusions[label="Common Fossils in Travertine
- Algae
- Plants
- Small animals
- Hominins"];HomininFossils[label="Notable Hominin Fossil Sites
- Bilzingsleben, Germany
- Kocabaş, Turkey"];Bilzingsleben[label="Bilzingsleben
- Excavated by Dietrich Mania
- Hominin skulls and tools found"];Kocabas[label="Kocabaş
- Hominin cranium discovered
- Estimated age: 1.6 - 1.2 million years"];BroaderQuestion[label="Broader Question:

- Quarrying exposes fossils
- Potential loss of evidence"];ContactAuthorities[label="If found, contact local authorities
- Laws on human remains vary"];FutureResearch[label="Future Research

- Importance of fossil discovery"];RedditPost->Dentist;Dentist->Travertine;Travertine->FossilInclusions;FossilInclusions->HomininFossils;HomininFossils->Bilzingsleben;HomininFossils->Kocabas;Dentist->BroaderQuestion;BroaderQuestion->IndustrialProcesses;BroaderQuestion->ContactAuthorities;BroaderQuestion->FutureResearch;}
